name: Rebellious Craftsman
description:
This is a small game made for the first AI & Games Game Jam with the theme "Breaking The Rules".

In this game you are a craftsman who builds weapons for the tyrannical empire. which is trying to suppress the rebels and kill them. But you secretly support the rebellion and want to help them in any way possible.

Empire will give you requests of weapons to build with certain specifications and send officers who can verify the weapons you have crafted. Your task is to craft weapons of lower quality (breaking the specifications) without getting caught by the officials and help the rebels to victory.

It has a basic AI system for each official which gives them personality and expertise in detecting fault in certain properties. For example, one officer would be good at analyzing strength of the weapon and another would be better at detecting hardness of the material.
